message.content: {"given_definition_quality":65,"better_definition":"to ask for leave from work or school","sentence":"我请假。","image_prompt":"A young adult stands in front of a simple desk, politely speaking to an older person behind the desk. The animation style is soft apocalypse, with calm muted colors and gentle lines.","sentence_translation":"I ask for leave."}
